document_data.name: Blood Sauce
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20220815035532/https://twitter.com/TheEdVerse/status/1559000877930799104| title = TheEdVerse on Twitter| accessdate = 15-8-2022| date = 15-8-2022}}
document_data.mainbody: The so-called '''blood sauce''' was a popular condiment that originated from [[Calimshan]] in [[West Faerûn]].
document_data.Description: Despite its colorful name, Calishite blood sauce contained no bodily fluid. Instead, the bloody color was achieved by cooking [[tomato]]es into a mildly-spicy and unsweetened [[chili]] sauce. The condiment was served
